synopsis:
One of the four short movies that showed in Animenotane 2021. 

In 2124, Christopher, who investigates Mars, discovers an unknown Earth-Mars repatriation ship. It's been 3 years since the news was unknown. Christopher steps into a repatriation ship to see the passengers and crew left behind on Mars. There, he meets a passenger, the ghost girl Cyane. Cyane, a lonely stone tape on Mars, tries to play with Christopher...
